TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ServiceContractGenerationOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Represents the contract generation options available using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the ServiceContractGenerationOptions enumeration with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator.Options%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to control the generated contract code.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions AsynchronousMethods = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Generates asynchronous methods for operations in addition to synchronous versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions ChannelInterface = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Generates an interface that derives from the contract interface and <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions ClientClass = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Generates a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client class that extends <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions EventBasedAsynchronousMethods = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Generates event-based asynchronous methods for operations in addition to synchronous versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions InternalTypes = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Causes all types to be marked internal.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions TaskBasedAsynchronousMethod = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Generates task based asynchronous methods for operations in addition to synchronous versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationOptions TypedMessages = int32(16)
